Description:
IN served - You have failed to provide suitable and sufficient means to prevent, so far as is reasonably practicable, any person falling a distance liable to cause personal injury from the beef slaughtering platform because there is no gate or mid-rails which means there is a gap through which a person working on the platform could fall.

IN served - You have failed to ensure that provide plant, namely the temperature controlled storage unit that is safe and without risk to health, so far as is reasonably practicable, because there is no means of exit from inside the temperature controlled storage unit or a way of raising an alarm in the event that someone should become trapped.
